pkgmetadata.longdescription: Human Protein Atlas Data for Tissue-Adjusted Pathway Analysis of Cancer (TPAC) // Contains summary data on gene expression in normal human tissues from the Human Protein Atlas for use with the Tissue-Adjusted Pathway Analysis of cancer (TPAC) method. Frost, H. Robert (2023) "Tissue-adjusted pathway analysis of cancer (TPAC)" doi:10.1101/2022.03.17.484779.
